verses.arabic: قَدْ أَفْلَحَ ٱلْمُؤْمِنُونَ
verses.english: Certainly will the believers have succeeded:
verses.hausa: Lalle ne, Mũminai sun sãmi babban rabõ.

verses.arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ هُمْ فِى صَلَاتِهِمْ خَـٰشِعُونَ
verses.english: They who are during their prayer humbly submissive
verses.hausa: Waɗanda suke a cikin sallarsu mãsu tawãli'u ne.

verses.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ هُمْ عَنِ ٱللَّغْوِ مُعْرِضُونَ
verses.english: And they who turn away from ill speech
verses.hausa: Kuma waɗanda suke, sũdaga barin yasassar magana, mãsu kau da kai ne.

verses.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ هُمْ لِلزَّكَوٰةِ فَـٰعِلُونَ
verses.english: And they who are observant of zakah
verses.hausa: Kuma waɗanda suke ga zakka mãsu aikatãwa ne.

verses.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ هُمْ لِفُرُوجِهِمْ حَـٰفِظُونَ
verses.english: And they who guard their private parts
verses.hausa: Kuma waɗanda suke ga farjõjinsu mãsu tsarẽwa ne.

verses.arabic: إِلَّا عَلَىٰٓ أَزْوَٰجِهِمْ أَوْ مَا مَلَكَتْ أَيْمَـٰنُهُمْ فَإِنَّهُمْ غَيْرُ مَلُومِينَ
verses.english: Except from their wives or those their right hands possess, for indeed, they will not be blamed -
verses.hausa: Fãce a kan mãtan aurensu, kõ kuwa abin da hannayen dãmansu suka mallaka to lalle sũ bã waɗanda ake zargi, ba, ne.

verses.arabic: فَمَنِ ٱبْتَغَىٰ وَرَآءَ ذَٰلِكَ فَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلْعَادُونَ
verses.english: But whoever seeks beyond that, then those are the transgressors -
verses.hausa: Sabõda haka wanda ya nẽmi abin da ke bãyan wancan, to, waɗancan sũ ne mãsu ƙẽtarẽwar haddi.

verses.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ هُمْ لِأَمَـٰنَـٰتِهِمْ وَعَهْدِهِمْ رَٰعُونَ
verses.english: And they who are to their trusts and their promises attentive
verses.hausa: Kuma waɗanda suke, sũga amãnõninsu da alkawarinsu mãsu tsarẽwa ne.

verses.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ هُمْ عَلَىٰ صَلَوَٰتِهِمْ يُحَافِظُونَ
verses.english: And they who carefully maintain their prayers -
verses.hausa: Kuma da waɗanda suke, sũ a kan sallõlinsu sunã tsarẽwa.

verses.arabic: أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلْوَٰرِثُونَ
verses.english: Those are the inheritors
verses.hausa: Waɗannan, sũ ne magãda.

verses.arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ يَرِثُونَ ٱلْفِرْدَوْسَ هُمْ فِيهَا خَـٰلِدُونَ
verses.english: Who will inherit al-Firdaus. They will abide therein eternally.
verses.hausa: Waɗanda suke gãdõn (Aljannar) Firdausi, su a cikinta madawwama ne.

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدْ خَلَقْنَا ٱلْإِنسَـٰنَ مِن سُلَـٰلَةٍ مِّن طِينٍ
verses.english: And certainly did We create man from an extract of clay.
verses.hausa: Kuma lalle ne, haƙĩƙa, Mun halitta mutum daga wani tsantsa daga lãka.

verses.arabic: ثُمَّ جَعَلْنَـٰهُ نُطْفَةً فِى قَرَارٍ مَّكِينٍ
verses.english: Then We placed him as a sperm-drop in a firm lodging.
verses.hausa: Sa'an nan kuma Muka sanya shi, ɗigon maniyyi a cikin matabbata natsattsiya.

verses.arabic: ثُمَّ خَلَقْنَا ٱلنُّطْفَةَ عَلَقَةً فَخَلَقْنَا ٱلْعَلَقَةَ مُضْغَةً فَخَلَقْنَا ٱلْمُضْغَةَ عِظَـٰمًا فَكَسَوْنَا ٱلْعِظَـٰمَ لَحْمًا ثُمَّ أَنشَأْنَـٰهُ خَلْقًا ءَاخَرَ ۚ فَتَبَارَكَ ٱللَّهُ أَحْسَنُ ٱلْخَـٰلِقِينَ
verses.english: Then We made the sperm-drop into a clinging clot, and We made the clot into a lump [of flesh], and We made [from] the lump, bones, and We covered the bones with flesh; then We developed him into another creation. So blessed is Allah, the best of creators.
verses.hausa: Sa'an nan kuma Muka halitta shi gudan jini, sa'an nan Muka halitta gudan jinin tsõka, sa'an nan Muka halitta tsõkar ta zama ƙasũsuwa, sa'an nan Muka tufãtar da ƙasũsuwan da wani nãma sa'an nan kuma Muka ƙãga shi wata halitta dabam. Sabõda haka albarkun Allah sun bayyana, Shi ne Mafi kyaun mãsu halittawa.

verses.arabic: ثُمَّ إِنَّكُم بَعْدَ ذَٰلِكَ لَمَيِّتُونَ
verses.english: Then indeed, after that you are to die.
verses.hausa: Sa'an nan kuma ku, bãyan wannan, lalle ne masu mutuwa ne.

verses.arabic: ثُمَّ إِنَّكُمْ يَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ تُبْعَثُونَ
verses.english: Then indeed you, on the Day of Resurrection, will be resurrected.
verses.hausa: Sa'an nan kuma lalle ne kũ a Rãnar ¡iyãma, za a iãyar da ku,

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدْ خَلَقْنَا فَوْقَكُمْ سَبْعَ طَرَآئِقَ وَمَا كُنَّا عَنِ ٱلْخَلْقِ غَـٰفِلِينَ
verses.english: And We have created above you seven layered heavens, and never have We been of [Our] creation unaware.
verses.hausa: Kuma lalle ne haƙĩƙa Mun halitta, a samanku, hanyõyi bakwai, kuma ba Mu kasance, daga barin halittar, Mãsu shagala ba.

verses.arabic: وَأَنزَلْنَا مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءًۢ بِقَدَرٍ فَأَسْكَنَّـٰهُ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ ۖ وَإِنَّا عَلَىٰ ذَهَابٍۭ بِهِۦ لَقَـٰدِرُونَ
verses.english: And We have sent down rain from the sky in a measured amount and settled it in the earth. And indeed, We are Able to take it away.
verses.hausa: Muka saukar da ruwa daga sama bisa gwargwado, sa'an nan Muka zaunar da shi a cikin ƙasa alhãli, lalle ne Mũ, a kan tafiyar da shi, Mãsu iyãwa ne.

verses.arabic: فَأَنشَأْنَا لَكُم بِهِۦ جَنَّـٰتٍ مِّن نَّخِيلٍ وَأَعْنَـٰبٍ لَّكُمْ فِيهَا فَوَٰكِهُ كَثِيرَةٌ وَمِنْهَا تَأْكُلُونَ
verses.english: And We brought forth for you thereby gardens of palm trees and grapevines in which for you are abundant fruits and from which you eat.
verses.hausa: Sai Muka ƙãga muku, game da shi (ruwan), gõnaki daga daĩnai da inabõbi, kunã da, a cikinsu, 'ya'yan itãcen marmari mãsu yawa, kuma daga gare su kuke ci.

verses.arabic: وَشَجَرَةً تَخْرُجُ مِن طُورِ سَيْنَآءَ تَنۢبُتُ بِٱلدُّهْنِ وَصِبْغٍ لِّلْـَٔاكِلِينَ
verses.english: And [We brought forth] a tree issuing from Mount Sinai which produces oil and food for those who eat.
verses.hausa: Da wata itãciya, tanã fita daga dũtsin Sainã'a, tanã tsira da man shãfãwa, da man miya dõmin masu cĩ.

verses.arabic: وَإِنَّ لَكُمْ فِى ٱلْأَنْعَـٰمِ لَعِبْرَةً ۖ نُّسْقِيكُم مِّمَّا فِى بُطُونِهَا وَلَكُمْ فِيهَا مَنَـٰفِعُ كَثِيرَةٌ وَمِنْهَا تَأْكُلُونَ
verses.english: And indeed, for you in livestock is a lesson. We give you drink from that which is in their bellies, and for you in them are numerous benefits, and from them you eat.
verses.hausa: Kuma lalle ne kunã da abin lũra a cikin dabbõbin ni'imõmi Munã shãyar da ku daga abin da yake a cikinsu, kuma kunã da a cikinsu abũbuwan amfãni mãsu yawa, kuma daga gare su kuke cĩ

verses.arabic: وَعَلَيْهَا وَعَلَى ٱلْفُلْكِ تُحْمَلُونَ
verses.english: And upon them and on ships you are carried.
verses.hausa: Kuma a kansu da a kan jirgin ruwa ake ɗaukar ku.

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدْ أَرْسَلْنَا نُوحًا إِلَىٰ قَوْمِهِۦ فَقَالَ يَـٰقَوْمِ ٱعْبُدُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ مَا لَكُم مِّنْ إِلَـٰهٍ غَيْرُهُۥٓ ۖ أَفَلَا تَتَّقُونَ
verses.english: And We had certainly sent Noah to his people, and he said, "O my people, worship Allah; you have no deity other than Him; then will you not fear Him?"
verses.hausa: Kuma lalle ne haƙĩƙa Mun aika Nũhu zuwa ga mutãnensa, sai ya ce: "Yã mutãnẽna! Ku bauta wa Allah. Bã ku da wani abin bautãwa waninsa. Shin, to, bã za ku yi taƙawa ba?"

verses.arabic: فَقَالَ ٱلْمَلَؤُا۟ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ مِن قَوْمِهِۦ مَا هَـٰذَآ إِلَّا بَشَرٌ مِّثْلُكُمْ يُرِيدُ أَن يَتَفَضَّلَ عَلَيْكُمْ وَلَوْ شَآءَ ٱللَّهُ لَأَنزَلَ مَلَـٰٓئِكَةً مَّا سَمِعْنَا بِهَـٰذَا فِىٓ ءَابَآئِنَا ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ
verses.english: But the eminent among those who disbelieved from his people said, "This is not but a man like yourselves who wishes to take precedence over you; and if Allah had willed [to send a messenger], He would have sent down angels. We have not heard of this among our forefathers.
verses.hausa: Sai mashãwarta waɗanda suka kãfirta daga mutãnensa, suka ce: "Wannan ba kõwa ba ne, fãce mutum misãlinku, yanã nufin ya ɗaukaka a kanku. Dã Allah Yã so, lalle ne dã Yã saukar da Malã'iku, Ba muji (kõme) ba, game da wannan, a cikin ubanninmu na farko."

verses.arabic: إِنْ هُوَ إِلَّا رَجُلٌۢ بِهِۦ جِنَّةٌ فَتَرَبَّصُوا۟ بِهِۦ حَتَّىٰ حِينٍ
verses.english: He is not but a man possessed with madness, so wait concerning him for a time."
verses.hausa: "Shi bai zamo kõwa ba fãce wani namiji ne, a gare shi akwai hauka, sai ku yi jinkiri da shi har wani lõkaci."

verses.arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ ٱنصُرْنِى بِمَا كَذَّبُونِ
verses.english: [Noah] said, "My Lord, support me because they have denied me."
verses.hausa: Ya ce: "Ya Ubangijĩna! Ka taimakeni sabõda sun ƙaryatani."

verses.arabic: فَأَوْحَيْنَآ إِلَيْهِ أَنِ ٱصْنَعِ ٱلْفُلْكَ بِأَعْيُنِنَا وَوَحْيِنَا فَإِذَا جَآءَ أَمْرُنَا وَفَارَ ٱلتَّنُّورُ ۙ فَٱسْلُكْ فِيهَا مِن كُلٍّ زَوْجَيْنِ ٱثْنَيْنِ وَأَهْلَكَ إِلَّا مَن سَبَقَ عَلَيْهِ ٱلْقَوْلُ مِنْهُمْ ۖ وَلَا تُخَـٰطِبْنِى فِى ٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوٓا۟ ۖ إِنَّهُم مُّغْرَقُونَ
verses.english: So We inspired to him, "Construct the ship under Our observation, and Our inspiration, and when Our command comes and the oven overflows, put into the ship from each [creature] two mates and your family, except those for whom the decree [of destruction] has proceeded. And do not address Me concerning those who have wronged; indeed, they are to be drowned.
verses.hausa: Sai Muka yi wahayi zuwa gare shi. "Ka sana'anta jirgin bisa ga idonMu, da wahayinMu. To, idan umuminMu ya jẽ, kuma tandã ta ɓuɓɓuga da ruwa, to, ka shigar a cikinta daga kõme, ma'aura biyu, da iyãlanka, sai wanda Magana ta gabãta a kansa, daga gare su, kuma kada ka rõƙẽ Ni (sabõda wani) a cikin waɗanda suka yi zãlunci, lalle ne sũ waɗanda ake nutsarwa ne.

verses.arabic: فَإِذَا ٱسْتَوَيْتَ أَنتَ وَمَن مَّعَكَ عَلَى ٱلْفُلْكِ فَقُلِ ٱلْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ ٱلَّذِى نَجَّىٰنَا مِنَ ٱلْقَوْمِ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ
verses.english: And when you have boarded the ship, you and those with you, then say, 'Praise to Allah who has saved us from the wrongdoing people.'
verses.hausa: "Sa'an nan idan ka daidaitu kai da waɗanda ke tãre da kai a kan jirgin, sai ka ce: "Gõdiya ta tabbata ga Allah wanda Ya tsĩrar damu daga mutãne azzãlumai."

verses.arabic: وَقُل رَّبِّ أَنزِلْنِى مُنزَلًا مُّبَارَكًا وَأَنتَ خَيْرُ ٱلْمُنزِلِينَ
verses.english: And say, 'My Lord, let me land at a blessed landing place, and You are the best to accommodate [us].' "
verses.hausa: "Kuma ka ce: 'Ya Ubangijĩna! Ka saukar da ni, saukarwa mai albarka. Kuma Kai ne Mafi alhẽrin mãsu saukarwa.'"

verses.arabic: إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَـَٔايَـٰتٍ وَإِن كُنَّا لَمُبْتَلِينَ
verses.english: Indeed in that are signs, and indeed, We are ever testing [Our servants].
verses.hausa: Lalle ne a cikin wancan akwai ãyõyi, ko da yake Mun kasance, haƙẽƙa' Mãsu jarrabãwa.

verses.arabic: ثُمَّ أَنشَأْنَا مِنۢ بَعْدِهِمْ قَرْنًا ءَاخَرِينَ
verses.english: Then We produced after them a generation of others.
verses.hausa: Sa'an nan kuma Muka ƙãga wani ƙarni na waɗansu dabam daga bãyansu.

verses.arabic: فَأَرْسَلْنَا فِيهِمْ رَسُولًا مِّنْهُمْ أَنِ ٱعْبُدُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ مَا لَكُم مِّنْ إِلَـٰهٍ غَيْرُهُۥٓ ۖ أَفَلَا تَتَّقُونَ
verses.english: And We sent among them a messenger from themselves, [saying], "Worship Allah; you have no deity other than Him; then will you not fear Him?"
verses.hausa: Sai Muka aika a cikinsu Manzo daga gare su. "Ku bauta wa Allah. Bã ku da wani abin bautãwa, sai Shi. Shin to, bã zã ku yi taƙawa ba?"

verses.arabic: وَقَالَ ٱلْمَلَأُ مِن قَوْمِهِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ وَكَذَّبُوا۟ بِلِقَآءِ ٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ وَأَتْرَفْنَـٰهُمْ فِى ٱلْحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنْيَا مَا هَـٰذَآ إِلَّا بَشَرٌ مِّثْلُكُمْ يَأْكُلُ مِمَّا تَأْكُلُونَ مِنْهُ وَيَشْرَبُ مِمَّا تَشْرَبُونَ
verses.english: And the eminent among his people who disbelieved and denied the meeting of the Hereafter while We had given them luxury in the worldly life said, "This is not but a man like yourselves. He eats of that from which you eat and drinks of what you drink.
verses.hausa: Mashãwarta daga mutãnensa, waɗanda suka kãfirta kuma suka ƙaryata game da haɗuwa da Lãhira, kuma Muka ni'imtar da su a cikin rãyuwar dũniya, suka ce: "Wannan bã kõwa ba fãce wani mutum ne kamarku, yanã cĩ daga abin da kuke cĩ daga gare shi, kuma yanã shã daga abin da kuke shã."

verses.arabic: وَلَئِنْ أَطَعْتُم بَشَرًا مِّثْلَكُمْ إِنَّكُمْ إِذًا لَّخَـٰسِرُونَ
verses.english: And if you should obey a man like yourselves, indeed, you would then be losers.
verses.hausa: "Kuma lalle ne idan kun yi ɗã' a ga mutum misãlinku, lalle ne, a lõkacin nan, haƙĩƙa, kũ mãsu hasãra ne."

verses.arabic: أَيَعِدُكُمْ أَنَّكُمْ إِذَا مِتُّمْ وَكُنتُمْ تُرَابًا وَعِظَـٰمًا أَنَّكُم مُّخْرَجُونَ
verses.english: Does he promise you that when you have died and become dust and bones that you will be brought forth [once more]?
verses.hausa: "Shin, yanã yi muku wa'adin (cẽwa) lalle kũ, idan kun mutu kuma kuka kasance turɓãya da ɓasũsuwa lalle ne kũ waɗanda ake fitarwa ne?"

verses.arabic: هَيْهَاتَ هَيْهَاتَ لِمَا تُوعَدُونَ
verses.english: How far, how far, is that which you are promised.
verses.hausa: "Faufau faufau ga abin da ake yi muku wa'adi da shi."

verses.arabic: إِنْ هِىَ إِلَّا حَيَاتُنَا ٱلدُّنْيَا نَمُوتُ وَنَحْيَا وَمَا نَحْنُ بِمَبْعُوثِينَ
verses.english: Life is not but our worldly life - we die and live, but we will not be resurrected.
verses.hausa: "Rãyuwa ba ta zama ba fãce rãyuwarmu ta dũniya, munã mutuwa kuma munã rãyuwa, kuma ba mu zama waɗanda ake tãyarwa ba."

verses.arabic: إِنْ هُوَ إِلَّا رَجُلٌ ٱفْتَرَىٰ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ كَذِبًا وَمَا نَحْنُ لَهُۥ بِمُؤْمِنِينَ
verses.english: He is not but a man who has invented a lie about Allah, and we will not believe him."
verses.hausa: "Bai zama kõwa ba fãce namiji, ya ƙirƙira ƙarya ga Allah, kuma ba mu zama, sabõda shi, mãsu ĩmãni ba."

verses.arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ ٱنصُرْنِى بِمَا كَذَّبُونِ
verses.english: He said, "My Lord, support me because they have denied me."
verses.hausa: Ya ce: "Ya Ubangijĩna! Ka taimake ni sabõda sun ƙaryatã ni."

verses.arabic: قَالَ عَمَّا قَلِيلٍ لَّيُصْبِحُنَّ نَـٰدِمِينَ
verses.english: [Allah] said, "After a little, they will surely become regretful."
verses.hausa: Ya ce: "Daga abu kaɗan, lalle ne zã su wãyi gari sunã mãsu nadãma."

verses.arabic: فَأَخَذَتْهُمُ ٱلصَّيْحَةُ بِٱلْحَقِّ فَجَعَلْنَـٰهُمْ غُثَآءً ۚ فَبُعْدًا لِّلْقَوْمِ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ
verses.english: So the shriek seized them in truth, and We made them as [plant] stubble. Then away with the wrongdoing people.
verses.hausa: Sai tsãwa ta kãma su da gaskiya, sai Muka sanya su tunkuɓa. Sabõda haka nĩsa ya tabbataga mutãne azzãlumai!

verses.arabic: ثُمَّ أَنشَأْنَا مِنۢ بَعْدِهِمْ قُرُونًا ءَاخَرِينَ
verses.english: Then We produced after them other generations.
verses.hausa: Sa'an kuma Muka ƙãga halittar wasu ƙarnõni dabam daga bayãnsu.

verses.arabic: مَا تَسْبِقُ مِنْ أُمَّةٍ أَجَلَهَا وَمَا يَسْتَـْٔخِرُونَ
verses.english: No nation will precede its time [of termination], nor will they remain [thereafter].
verses.hausa: Wata al'umma bã ta gabãtar ajalinta, kuma bã zã su jinkirta ba.

verses.arabic: ثُمَّ أَرْسَلْنَا رُسُلَنَا تَتْرَا ۖ كُلَّ مَا جَآءَ أُمَّةً رَّسُولُهَا كَذَّبُوهُ ۚ فَأَتْبَعْنَا بَعْضَهُم بَعْضًا وَجَعَلْنَـٰهُمْ أَحَادِيثَ ۚ فَبُعْدًا لِّقَوْمٍ لَّا يُؤْمِنُونَ
verses.english: Then We sent Our messengers in succession. Every time there came to a nation its messenger, they denied him, so We made them follow one another [to destruction], and We made them narrations. So away with a people who do not believe.
verses.hausa: Sa'an nan kuma Muka aika da ManzanninMu jẽre a kõda yaushe Manzon wata al'umma ya jẽ mata, sai su ƙaryata shi, sabõda haka Muka biyar da sãshensu ga sãshe, kuma Muka sanya su lãbãrun hĩra. To, nĩsa ya tabbata ga mutãne (waɗanda) bã su yin ĩmãni!

verses.arabic: ثُمَّ أَرْسَلْنَا مُوسَىٰ وَأَخَاهُ هَـٰرُونَ بِـَٔايَـٰتِنَا وَسُلْطَـٰنٍ مُّبِينٍ
verses.english: Then We sent Moses and his brother Aaron with Our signs and a clear authority
verses.hausa: Sa'an nan kuma Muka aika Mũsã da ɗan'uwansa Hãrũna, game da ãyõyinMu da, dalĩli bayyananne.

verses.arabic: إِلَىٰ فِرْعَوْنَ وَمَلَإِي۟هِۦ فَٱسْتَكْبَرُوا۟ وَكَانُوا۟ قَوْمًا عَالِينَ
verses.english: To Pharaoh and his establishment, but they were arrogant and were a haughty people.
verses.hausa: Zuwa ga Fir'auna da majalisarsa, sai suka kangara, alhãli sun kasance mutãne ne marinjãya.

verses.arabic: فَقَالُوٓا۟ أَنُؤْمِنُ لِبَشَرَيْنِ مِثْلِنَا وَقَوْمُهُمَا لَنَا عَـٰبِدُونَ
verses.english: They said, "Should we believe two men like ourselves while their people are for us in servitude?"
verses.hausa: Sai suka ce: "Shin, zã Mu yi ĩmãni sabõda wasu mutãne biyu misãlinmu, alhãli kuwa mutãnensu a gare mu, mãsu bauta ne."

verses.arabic: فَكَذَّبُوهُمَا فَكَانُوا۟ مِنَ ٱلْمُهْلَكِينَ
verses.english: So they denied them and were of those destroyed.
verses.hausa: Sai suka ƙaryata su sabõda haka suka kasance halakakku.

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدْ ءَاتَيْنَا مُوسَى ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ لَعَلَّهُمْ يَهْتَدُونَ
verses.english: And We certainly gave Moses the Scripture that perhaps they would be guided.
verses.hausa: Kuma lalle ne, haƙĩƙa, Mun bai wa Mũsã littãfi tsammaninsu zã su shiryu.

verses.arabic: وَجَعَلْنَا ٱبْنَ مَرْيَمَ وَأُمَّهُۥٓ ءَايَةً وَءَاوَيْنَـٰهُمَآ إِلَىٰ رَبْوَةٍ ذَاتِ قَرَارٍ وَمَعِينٍ
verses.english: And We made the son of Mary and his mother a sign and sheltered them within a high ground having level [areas] and flowing water.
verses.hausa: Kuma Mun sanya ¦an Maryama, shi da uwarsa wata ãyã Kuma Muka tattara su zuwa ga wani tsauni ma'abũcin natsuwa da marẽmari.

verses.arabic: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلرُّسُلُ كُلُوا۟ مِنَ ٱلطَّيِّبَـٰتِ وَٱعْمَلُوا۟ صَـٰلِحًا ۖ إِنِّى بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ عَلِيمٌ
verses.english: [Allah said], "O messengers, eat from the good foods and work righteousness. Indeed, I, of what you do, am Knowing.
verses.hausa: Yã ku Manzanni! Ku ci daga abũbuwa mãsu dãɗi kuma ku aikata aikin ƙwarai. Lalle Nĩga abin da kuke aikatãwa, Masani ne.

verses.arabic: وَإِنَّ هَـٰذِهِۦٓ أُمَّتُكُمْ أُمَّةً وَٰحِدَةً وَأَنَا۠ رَبُّكُمْ فَٱتَّقُونِ
verses.english: And indeed this, your religion, is one religion, and I am your Lord, so fear Me."
verses.hausa: Kuma lalle ne, wannan al'ummarku ce, al'umma guda, kuma Nĩ, Ubangijinku ne, sai ku bĩ Ni da taƙawa.

verses.arabic: فَتَقَطَّعُوٓا۟ أَمْرَهُم بَيْنَهُمْ زُبُرًا ۖ كُلُّ حِزْبٍۭ بِمَا لَدَيْهِمْ فَرِحُونَ
verses.english: But the people divided their religion among them into sects - each faction, in what it has, rejoicing.
verses.hausa: Sai (al'ummar) suka yanyanke al'amarinsu a tsakãninsu guntu-guntu, kõwace ƙungiya sunã mãsu farin ciki da abin da yake a gare su.

verses.arabic: فَذَرْهُمْ فِى غَمْرَتِهِمْ حَتَّىٰ حِينٍ
verses.english: So leave them in their confusion for a time.
verses.hausa: To, ka bar su a cikin ɓatarsu har a wani lõkaci.

verses.arabic: أَيَحْسَبُونَ أَنَّمَا نُمِدُّهُم بِهِۦ مِن مَّالٍ وَبَنِينَ
verses.english: Do they think that what We extend to them of wealth and children
verses.hausa: Shin, sunã zaton cẽwa abin da Muke taimakon su da shi daga dũkiya da ɗiya,

verses.arabic: نُسَارِعُ لَهُمْ فِى ٱلْخَيْرَٰتِ ۚ بَل لَّا يَشْعُرُونَ
verses.english: Is [because] We hasten for them good things? Rather, they do not perceive.
verses.hausa: Munã yi musu gaggãwa ne a cikin alhẽrõri?

verses.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ هُم مِّنْ خَشْيَةِ رَبِّهِم مُّشْفِقُونَ
verses.english: Indeed, they who are apprehensive from fear of their Lord
verses.hausa: Lalle ne waɗanda suke mãsu sauna sabo da tsõron Ubangijinsu,

verses.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ هُم بِـَٔايَـٰتِ رَبِّهِمْ يُؤْمِنُونَ
verses.english: And they who believe in the signs of their Lord
verses.hausa: Da waɗanda suke, game da ãyõyin Ubangijinsu sunã ĩmãni,

verses.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ هُم بِرَبِّهِمْ لَا يُشْرِكُونَ
verses.english: And they who do not associate anything with their Lord
verses.hausa: Da waɗanda suke game da Ubangijinsu bã su yin shirki,

verses.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ يُؤْتُونَ مَآ ءَاتَوا۟ وَّقُلُوبُهُمْ وَجِلَةٌ أَنَّهُمْ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِمْ رَٰجِعُونَ
verses.english: And they who give what they give while their hearts are fearful because they will be returning to their Lord -
verses.hausa: Da waɗanda ke bãyar da abin da suka bãyar, alhãli kuwa zukãtansu sunã tsõrace dõmin sunã kõmãwa zuwa ga Ubangijinsu,

verses.arabic: أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ يُسَـٰرِعُونَ فِى ٱلْخَيْرَٰتِ وَهُمْ لَهَا سَـٰبِقُونَ
verses.english: It is those who hasten to good deeds, and they outstrip [others] therein.
verses.hausa: Waɗancan sunã gaggãwar tsẽre a cikin ayyukan alhẽri, alhãli kuwa sunã mãsu tsẽrẽwa zuwa gare su (ayyukan alhẽri).

verses.arabic: وَلَا نُكَلِّفُ نَفْسًا إِلَّا وُسْعَهَا ۖ وَلَدَيْنَا كِتَـٰبٌ يَنطِقُ بِٱلْحَقِّ ۚ وَهُمْ لَا يُظْلَمُونَ
verses.english: And We charge no soul except [with that within] its capacity, and with Us is a record which speaks with truth; and they will not be wronged.
verses.hausa: Kuma bã Mu kallafa wa rai fãce abin iyawarsa, kuma a wurinMu akwai wani Littãfi wanda yake magana da gakiya, kuma sũ bã a zãluntar su.

verses.arabic: بَلْ قُلُوبُهُمْ فِى غَمْرَةٍ مِّنْ هَـٰذَا وَلَهُمْ أَعْمَـٰلٌ مِّن دُونِ ذَٰلِكَ هُمْ لَهَا عَـٰمِلُونَ
verses.english: But their hearts are covered with confusion over this, and they have [evil] deeds besides disbelief which they are doing,
verses.hausa: Ã'a, zukãtansu sunã cikin jãhilci daga wannan (magana), kuma sunã da waɗansu ayyuka, baicin wancan, sũ a gare su, mãsu aikatãwa ne.

verses.arabic: حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَآ أَخَذْنَا مُتْرَفِيهِم بِٱلْعَذَابِ إِذَا هُمْ يَجْـَٔرُونَ
verses.english: Until when We seize their affluent ones with punishment, at once they are crying [to Allah] for help.
verses.hausa: Har idan Mun kãma mani'imtansu da azãba, sai gã su sunã hargõwa.

verses.arabic: لَا تَجْـَٔرُوا۟ ٱلْيَوْمَ ۖ إِنَّكُم مِّنَّا لَا تُنصَرُونَ
verses.english: Do not cry out today. Indeed, by Us you will not be helped.
verses.hausa: Kada ku yi hargowa a yau, lalle ne kũ, daga gare Mu bã a taimakon ku.

verses.arabic: قَدْ كَانَتْ ءَايَـٰتِى تُتْلَىٰ عَلَيْكُمْ فَكُنتُمْ عَلَىٰٓ أَعْقَـٰبِكُمْ تَنكِصُونَ
verses.english: My verses had already been recited to you, but you were turning back on your heels
verses.hausa: Lalle ne, ãyõyĩNa sun kasance anã karãtun su a kanku, sai kuka kasance, a kan dugãduganku, kunã kõmãwa bãya.

verses.arabic: مُسْتَكْبِرِينَ بِهِۦ سَـٰمِرًا تَهْجُرُونَ
verses.english: In arrogance regarding it, conversing by night, speaking evil.
verses.hausa: Kunã mãsu girman kai gare shi (Annabi), da hĩrã kunã alfãsha.

verses.arabic: أَفَلَمْ يَدَّبَّرُوا۟ ٱلْقَوْلَ أَمْ جَآءَهُم مَّا لَمْ يَأْتِ ءَابَآءَهُمُ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ
verses.english: Then have they not reflected over the Qur'an, or has there come to them that which had not come to their forefathers?
verses.hausa: Shin fa, ba su yi ta'ammalin maganar (Alƙur'ãni) ba, kõ abin da bai jẽ wa ubanninsu na farko ba ne ya jẽ musu?

verses.arabic: أَمْ لَمْ يَعْرِفُوا۟ رَسُولَهُمْ فَهُمْ لَهُۥ مُنكِرُونَ
verses.english: Or did they not know their Messenger, so they are toward him disacknowledging?
verses.hausa: Kõ ba su san Manzonsu ba ne dõmin haka suke mãsu musu a gare shi?

verses.arabic: أَمْ يَقُولُونَ بِهِۦ جِنَّةٌۢ ۚ بَلْ جَآءَهُم بِٱلْحَقِّ وَأَكْثَرُهُمْ لِلْحَقِّ كَـٰرِهُونَ
verses.english: Or do they say, "In him is madness?" Rather, he brought them the truth, but most of them, to the truth, are averse.
verses.hausa: Kõ sunã cẽwa, "Akwai hauka gare shi?" Ã'a, yã zo musu da gaskiya, alhãli kuwa mafi yawansu, ga gaskiya, mãsu ƙi ne.

verses.arabic: وَلَوِ ٱتَّبَعَ ٱلْحَقُّ أَهْوَآءَهُمْ لَفَسَدَتِ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتُ وَٱلْأَرْضُ وَمَن فِيهِنَّ ۚ بَلْ أَتَيْنَـٰهُم بِذِكْرِهِمْ فَهُمْ عَن ذِكْرِهِم مُّعْرِضُونَ
verses.english: But if the Truth had followed their inclinations, the heavens and the earth and whoever is in them would have been ruined. Rather, We have brought them their message, but they, from their message, are turning away.
verses.hausa: Kuma dã gaskiya (Alƙur'ãni) yã bi son zuciyoyinsu, haƙĩƙa dã sammai da ƙasa da wanda yake a cikinsu sun ɓãci. Ã'a, Mun tafo musu da ambaton (darajar) su, sa'an nan sũ daga barin ambaton su mãsu bijirẽwa ne, bijirẽwa.

verses.arabic: أَمْ تَسْـَٔلُهُمْ خَرْجًا فَخَرَاجُ رَبِّكَ خَيْرٌ ۖ وَهُوَ خَيْرُ ٱلرَّٰزِقِينَ
verses.english: Or do you, [O Muhammad], ask them for payment? But the reward of your Lord is best, and He is the best of providers.
verses.hausa: Kõ kanã tambayar su wani harãji ne (a kan iyar da Manzanci a gare su)? To, harãjin Ubangijinka ne mafi alhẽri kuma Shĩ ne Mafi alhẽrin mãsu ciyarwa.

verses.arabic: وَإِنَّكَ لَتَدْعُوهُمْ إِلَىٰ صِرَٰطٍ مُّسْتَقِيمٍ
verses.english: And indeed, you invite them to a straight path.
verses.hausa: Kuma lalle ne kai haƙĩƙa kanã kiran su zuwa ga hanya madaidaiciya.

verses.arabic: وَإِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ بِٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ عَنِ ٱلصِّرَٰطِ لَنَـٰكِبُونَ
verses.english: But indeed, those who do not believe in the Hereafter are deviating from the path.
verses.hausa: Kuma lalle waɗanda ba su yi ĩmãni da Lãhira ba mãsu karkacẽwa daga hanya ne.

verses.arabic: وَلَوْ رَحِمْنَـٰهُمْ وَكَشَفْنَا مَا بِهِم مِّن ضُرٍّ لَّلَجُّوا۟ فِى طُغْيَـٰنِهِمْ يَعْمَهُونَ
verses.english: And even if We gave them mercy and removed what was upon them of affliction, they would persist in their transgression, wandering blindly.
verses.hausa: Kuma dã Mun ji tausayinsu, kuma Muka kuranye musu abin da yake tãre da su na cũta, lalle ne dã sun yi zurfi a cikin ɓatarsu, sunã ɗimuwa.

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدْ أَخَذْنَـٰهُم بِٱلْعَذَابِ فَمَا ٱسْتَكَانُوا۟ لِرَبِّهِمْ وَمَا يَتَضَرَّعُونَ
verses.english: And We had gripped them with suffering [as a warning], but they did not yield to their Lord, nor did they humbly supplicate, [and will continue thus]
verses.hausa: Kuma lalle ne haƙĩƙa Munã kãma su da azãba sai dai ba su saukar da kai ba, ga Ubangijinsu, kama bã su yin tawãli'u.

verses.arabic: حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا فَتَحْنَا عَلَيْهِم بَابًا ذَا عَذَابٍ شَدِيدٍ إِذَا هُمْ فِيهِ مُبْلِسُونَ
verses.english: Until when We have opened before them a door of severe punishment, immediately they will be therein in despair.
verses.hausa: Har idan Mun bũɗe, akansu, wata ƙõfa mai azãba mai tsanani sai gã su a cikinta sunã mãsu mugi.

verses.arabic: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِىٓ أَنشَأَ لَكُمُ ٱلسَّمْعَ وَٱلْأَبْصَـٰرَ وَٱلْأَفْـِٔدَةَ ۚ قَلِيلًا مَّا تَشْكُرُونَ
verses.english: And it is He who produced for you hearing and vision and hearts; little are you grateful.
verses.hausa: Kuma Shi ne Wanda Ya ƙãga halittar ji da gani da zukãta dominku. Kaɗan ƙwarai kuke gõdẽwa.

verses.arabic: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِى ذَرَأَكُمْ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ وَإِلَيْهِ تُحْشَرُونَ
verses.english: And it is He who has multiplied you throughout the earth, and to Him you will be gathered.
verses.hausa: Kuma Shĩ ne Ya halitta ku a cikin ƙasa, kuma zuwa gare Shi ake tãyar da ku.

verses.arabic: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِى يُحْىِۦ وَيُمِيتُ وَلَهُ ٱخْتِلَـٰفُ ٱلَّيْلِ وَٱلنَّهَارِ ۚ أَفَلَا تَعْقِلُونَ
verses.english: And it is He who gives life and causes death, and His is the alternation of the night and the day. Then will you not reason?
verses.hausa: Kuma Shĩ ne Wanda Yake rãyarwa, kuma Yanã matarwa, kuma a gare Shi ne sãɓawar dare da yini take. Shin, to, bã zã ku hankalta ba?

verses.arabic: بَلْ قَالُوا۟ مِثْلَ مَا قَالَ ٱلْأَوَّلُونَ
verses.english: Rather, they say like what the former peoples said.
verses.hausa: Ã'a, sun faɗi misãlin abin da na farko suka faɗa.

verses.arabic: قَالُوٓا۟ أَءِذَا مِتْنَا وَكُنَّا تُرَابًا وَعِظَـٰمًا أَءِنَّا لَمَبْعُوثُونَ
verses.english: They said, "When we have died and become dust and bones, are we indeed to be resurrected?
verses.hausa: Suka ce: "Shin idan mun mutu kuma muka kasance turɓaya da ƙasũsuwa shin lal1e ne mu haƙĩƙa waɗanda ake tãyarwa ne?

verses.arabic: لَقَدْ وُعِدْنَا نَحْنُ وَءَابَآؤُنَا هَـٰذَا مِن قَبْلُ إِنْ هَـٰذَآ إِلَّآ أَسَـٰطِيرُ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ
verses.english: We have been promised this, we and our forefathers, before; this is not but legends of the former peoples."
verses.hausa: "Lalle ne, haƙĩƙa, an yi mana wa'adi, mũ da ubanninmu ga wannan a gabãni, wannan abu bai zama kõme ba, fãce tãtsũniyõyin na farko."

verses.arabic: قُل لِّمَنِ ٱلْأَرْضُ وَمَن فِيهَآ إِن كُنتُمْ تَعْلَمُونَ
verses.english: Say, [O Muhammad], "To whom belongs the earth and whoever is in it, if you should know?"
verses.hausa: Ka ce: "Wane ne da mulkin ƙasa da wanda ke a cikinta, idan kun kasance kunã sani?"

verses.arabic: سَيَقُولُونَ لِلَّهِ ۚ قُلْ أَفَلَا تَذَكَّرُونَ
verses.english: They will say, "To Allah." Say, "Then will you not remember?"
verses.hausa: Zã su ce: "Ta Allah ne." Ka ce, "Shin, to, bã zã ku yi tunãni ba?"

verses.arabic: قُلْ مَن رَّبُّ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ ٱلسَّبْعِ وَرَبُّ ٱلْعَرْشِ ٱلْعَظِيمِ
verses.english: Say, "Who is Lord of the seven heavens and Lord of the Great Throne?"
verses.hausa: Ka ce: "Wãne ne Ubangijin sammai bakwai kuma Ubangijin Al'arshi mai girma?"

verses.arabic: سَيَقُولُونَ لِلَّهِ ۚ قُلْ أَفَلَا تَتَّقُونَ
verses.english: They will say, "[They belong] to Allah." Say, "Then will you not fear Him?"
verses.hausa: Zã su ce: "Na Allah ne." Ka ce, "Shin, to, bã zã ku bĩ Shi da taƙawa ba?"

verses.arabic: قُلْ مَنۢ بِيَدِهِۦ مَلَكُوتُ كُلِّ شَىْءٍ وَهُوَ يُجِيرُ وَلَا يُجَارُ عَلَيْهِ إِن كُنتُمْ تَعْلَمُونَ
verses.english: Say, "In whose hand is the realm of all things - and He protects while none can protect against Him - if you should know?"
verses.hausa: Ka ce: "Wãne ne ga hannunsa mallakar kõwane abu take alhãli kuwa shi yanã tsarẽwar wani, kuma ba a tsare kõwa daga gare shi, idan kun kasance kunã sani?"

verses.arabic: سَيَقُولُونَ لِلَّهِ ۚ قُلْ فَأَنَّىٰ تُسْحَرُونَ
verses.english: They will say, "[All belongs] to Allah." Say, "Then how are you deluded?"
verses.hausa: Zã su ce: "Ga Allah yake." Ka ce: "To, yãya ake sihirce ku?"

verses.arabic: بَلْ أَتَيْنَـٰهُم بِٱلْحَقِّ وَإِنَّهُمْ لَكَـٰذِبُونَ
verses.english: Rather, We have brought them the truth, and indeed they are liars.
verses.hausa: Ã'a, Mun zo musu da gaskiya, kuma lalle ne sũ, haƙĩƙa, maƙaryata ne.

verses.arabic: مَا ٱتَّخَذَ ٱللَّهُ مِن وَلَدٍ وَمَا كَانَ مَعَهُۥ مِنْ إِلَـٰهٍ ۚ إِذًا لَّذَهَبَ كُلُّ إِلَـٰهٍۭ بِمَا خَلَقَ وَلَعَلَا بَعْضُهُمْ عَلَىٰ بَعْضٍ ۚ سُبْحَـٰنَ ٱللَّهِ عَمَّا يَصِفُونَ
verses.english: Allah has not taken any son, nor has there ever been with Him any deity. [If there had been], then each deity would have taken what it created, and some of them would have sought to overcome others. Exalted is Allah above what they describe [concerning Him].
verses.hausa: Allah bai riƙi wani abin haihuwa ba, kuma bãbu wani abin bautãwa tãre da Shi. Idan haka ne (akwai abin bautawa tare da Shi), lalle ne dã kõwane abin bautawar ya tafi da abin da ya halitta, kuma lalle ne, dã waɗansu sun rinjãya a kan waɗansu, tsarki ya tabbata ga Allah, daga abin da suke siffantãwa.

verses.arabic: عَـٰلِمِ ٱلْغَيْبِ وَٱلشَّهَـٰدَةِ فَتَعَـٰلَىٰ عَمَّا يُشْرِكُونَ
verses.english: [He is] Knower of the unseen and the witnessed, so high is He above what they associate [with Him].
verses.hausa: Masanin ɓõye da bayyane. sa'an nan Ya ɗaukaka daga barin abin da suke yi na shirka.

verses.arabic: قُل رَّبِّ إِمَّا تُرِيَنِّى مَا يُوعَدُونَ
verses.english: Say, [O Muhammad], "My Lord, if You should show me that which they are promised,
verses.hausa: Ka ce: "Yã Ubangijina! Ko dai Ka nũna mini abin da ake yi musu wa'adi da shi."

verses.arabic: رَبِّ فَلَا تَجْعَلْنِى فِى ٱلْقَوْمِ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ
verses.english: My Lord, then do not place me among the wrongdoing people."
verses.hausa: "Yã Ubangijina, to, kada Ka sanya ni a cikin mutãne azzãlumai."

verses.arabic: وَإِنَّا عَلَىٰٓ أَن نُّرِيَكَ مَا نَعِدُهُمْ لَقَـٰدِرُونَ
verses.english: And indeed, We are able to show you what We have promised them.
verses.hausa: Kuma lalle ne Mũ haƙĩƙa Mãsu iyawa ne a kan Mu nũna maka abin da Muke yi musu wa'adi da shi.

verses.arabic: ٱدْفَعْ بِٱلَّتِى هِىَ أَحْسَنُ ٱلسَّيِّئَةَ ۚ نَحْنُ أَعْلَمُ بِمَا يَصِفُونَ
verses.english: Repel, by [means of] what is best, [their] evil. We are most knowing of what they describe.
verses.hausa: Ka tunkuɗe cũta da wadda take ita ce mafi kyau. Mũ neMafi sani game da abin da suke siffantãwa.

verses.arabic: وَقُل رَّبِّ أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ هَمَزَٰتِ ٱلشَّيَـٰطِينِ
verses.english: And say, "My Lord, I seek refuge in You from the incitements of the devils,
verses.hausa: Ka ce: "Yã Ubangijĩna, inã nẽman tsari da Kai daga fizge-fizgen Shaiɗãnu."

verses.arabic: وَأَعُوذُ بِكَ رَبِّ أَن يَحْضُرُونِ
verses.english: And I seek refuge in You, my Lord, lest they be present with me."
verses.hausa: "Kuma inã nẽman tsari da Kai, ya Ubangijĩna! Dõmin kada su halarto ni, "

verses.arabic: حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا جَآءَ أَحَدَهُمُ ٱلْمَوْتُ قَالَ رَبِّ ٱرْجِعُونِ
verses.english: [For such is the state of the disbelievers], until, when death comes to one of them, he says, "My Lord, send me back
verses.hausa: Har idan mutuwa ta jẽ wa ɗayansu, sai ya ce: "Yã Ubangijina, Ku mayar da ni (dũniya)."

verses.arabic: لَعَلِّىٓ أَعْمَلُ صَـٰلِحًا فِيمَا تَرَكْتُ ۚ كَلَّآ ۚ إِنَّهَا كَلِمَةٌ هُوَ قَآئِلُهَا ۖ وَمِن وَرَآئِهِم بَرْزَخٌ إِلَىٰ يَوْمِ يُبْعَثُونَ
verses.english: That I might do righteousness in that which I left behind." No! It is only a word he is saying; and behind them is a barrier until the Day they are resurrected.
verses.hausa: "Tsammãnina in aikata aiki na ƙwarai cikin abin da na bari." Kayya! Lalle ne ita kalma ce, shĩ ne mafaɗinta, alhãli kuwa a bãya gare su akwai wani shãmaki har rãnar da zã a tãyar da su.

verses.arabic: فَإِذَا نُفِخَ فِى ٱلصُّورِ فَلَآ أَنسَابَ بَيْنَهُمْ يَوْمَئِذٍ وَلَا يَتَسَآءَلُونَ
verses.english: So when the Horn is blown, no relationship will there be among them that Day, nor will they ask about one another.
verses.hausa: Sa'an nan idan an yi bũsa a cikin ƙaho, to, bãbu dangantakõki a tsakãninsu a rãnar nan kuma bã zã su tambayi jũnansu ba.

verses.arabic: فَمَن ثَقُلَتْ مَوَٰزِينُهُۥ فَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلْمُفْلِحُونَ
verses.english: And those whose scales are heavy [with good deeds] - it is they who are the successful.
verses.hausa: To, wadanda sikẽlinsu ya yi nauyi, to, waɗannan sũ ne mãsu babban rabo.

verses.arabic: وَمَنْ خَفَّتْ مَوَٰزِينُهُۥ فَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ خَسِرُوٓا۟ أَنفُسَهُمْ فِى جَهَنَّمَ خَـٰلِدُونَ
verses.english: But those whose scales are light - those are the ones who have lost their souls, [being] in Hell, abiding eternally.
verses.hausa: Kuma waɗanda sikẽlinsu ya yi sauƙi, to, waɗannan ne waɗanda suka yi hasãrar rãyukansu sunã madawwama a cikin Jahannama.

verses.arabic: تَلْفَحُ وُجُوهَهُمُ ٱلنَّارُ وَهُمْ فِيهَا كَـٰلِحُونَ
verses.english: The Fire will sear their faces, and they therein will have taut smiles.
verses.hausa: Fuskokinsu sunã balbalar wuta, kuma su a cikinta mãsu yãgaggun leɓɓa daga haƙõra ne.

verses.arabic: أَلَمْ تَكُنْ ءَايَـٰتِى تُتْلَىٰ عَلَيْكُمْ فَكُنتُم بِهَا تُكَذِّبُونَ
verses.english: [It will be said]. "Were not My verses recited to you and you used to deny them?"
verses.hausa: "Shin, ayõyĩNa ba su kasance anã karanta su a kanku ba sai kuka kasance game da su kunã ƙaryatãwa?"

verses.arabic: قَالُوا۟ رَبَّنَا غَلَبَتْ عَلَيْنَا شِقْوَتُنَا وَكُنَّا قَوْمًا ضَآلِّينَ
verses.english: They will say, "Our Lord, our wretchedness overcame us, and we were a people astray.
verses.hausa: Suka ce: "Yã Ubangijinmu, shaƙãwamiu ce ta rinjãya a kanmu, kuma mun kasance mutãne ɓatattu."

verses.arabic: رَبَّنَآ أَخْرِجْنَا مِنْهَا فَإِنْ عُدْنَا فَإِنَّا ظَـٰلِمُونَ
verses.english: Our Lord, remove us from it, and if we were to return [to evil], we would indeed be wrongdoers."
verses.hausa: "Yã Ubangjinmu! Ka fitar da mu daga gare ta, sa'an nan idan mun kõma, to, lalle ne, mũ ne mãsu zãlunci."

verses.arabic: قَالَ ٱخْسَـُٔوا۟ فِيهَا وَلَا تُكَلِّمُونِ
verses.english: He will say, "Remain despised therein and do not speak to Me.
verses.hausa: Ya ce: "Ku tafi (da wulãkanci) a cikinta. Kada ku yi Mini magana."

verses.arabic: إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ فَرِيقٌ مِّنْ عِبَادِى يَقُولُونَ رَبَّنَآ ءَامَنَّا فَٱغْفِرْ لَنَا وَٱرْحَمْنَا وَأَنتَ خَيْرُ ٱلرَّٰحِمِينَ
verses.english: Indeed, there was a party of My servants who said, 'Our Lord, we have believed, so forgive us and have mercy upon us, and You are the best of the merciful.'
verses.hausa: Lalle ne waɗansu ƙungiyoyi daga bãyiNa sun kasance sunã cẽwa, "Yã Ubangijinmu! Mun yi ĩmãni, sai Ka gãfarta mana, kuma Ka yi mana rahama, kuma Kai ne Mafi alhẽrin mãsu tausayi."

verses.arabic: فَٱتَّخَذْتُمُوهُمْ سِخْرِيًّا حَتَّىٰٓ أَنسَوْكُمْ ذِكْرِى وَكُنتُم مِّنْهُمْ تَضْحَكُونَ
verses.english: But you took them in mockery to the point that they made you forget My remembrance, and you used to laugh at them.
verses.hausa: Sai kuka riƙe su lẽburõri har suka mantar da ku ambatõNa kuma kun kasance, daga gare su kuke yin dãriya.

verses.arabic: إِنِّى جَزَيْتُهُمُ ٱلْيَوْمَ بِمَا صَبَرُوٓا۟ أَنَّهُمْ هُمُ ٱلْفَآئِزُونَ
verses.english: Indeed, I have rewarded them this Day for their patient endurance - that they are the attainers [of success]."
verses.hausa: Lalle ne Nĩ Inã sãka musu a yau, sabõda abin da suka yi wa haƙuri. Dõmin lalle ne sũ sũ ne mãsu sãmun babban rabo.

verses.arabic: قَـٰلَ كَمْ لَبِثْتُمْ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ عَدَدَ سِنِينَ
verses.english: [Allah] will say, "How long did you remain on earth in number of years?"
verses.hausa: Ya ce: "Nawa kuka zauna a cikin ƙasa na ƙidãyar shẽkaru?"

verses.arabic: قَالُوا۟ لَبِثْنَا يَوْمًا أَوْ بَعْضَ يَوْمٍ فَسْـَٔلِ ٱلْعَآدِّينَ
verses.english: They will say, "We remained a day or part of a day; ask those who enumerate."
verses.hausa: Suka ce: "Mun zauna a yini ɗaya ko rabin yini, sai ka tambayi mãsu ƙidãyãwa."

verses.arabic: قَـٰلَ إِن لَّبِثْتُمْ إِلَّا قَلِيلًا ۖ لَّوْ أَنَّكُمْ كُنتُمْ تَعْلَمُونَ
verses.english: He will say, "You stayed not but a little - if only you had known.
verses.hausa: Ya ce: "Ba ku zauna ba fãce kaɗan, dã dai kun kasance kunã sani."

verses.arabic: أَفَحَسِبْتُمْ أَنَّمَا خَلَقْنَـٰكُمْ عَبَثًا وَأَنَّكُمْ إِلَيْنَا لَا تُرْجَعُونَ
verses.english: Then did you think that We created you uselessly and that to Us you would not be returned?"
verses.hausa: "Shin, to, kun yi zaton cẽwa Mun halitta ku ne da wãsa kuma lalle ku, zuwa gare Mu, bã zã ku kõmo ba?"

verses.arabic: فَتَعَـٰلَى ٱللَّهُ ٱلْمَلِكُ ٱلْحَقُّ ۖ لَآ إِلَـٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ رَبُّ ٱلْعَرْشِ ٱلْكَرِيمِ
verses.english: So exalted is Allah, the Sovereign, the Truth; there is no deity except Him, Lord of the Noble Throne.
verses.hausa: Allah Mamallaki gaskiya, Yã ɗaukaka. Bãbu abin bautãwa, fãce Shi. Shĩ ne Ubangijin Al'arshi, mai daraja.

verses.arabic: وَمَن يَدْعُ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَـٰهًا ءَاخَرَ لَا بُرْهَـٰنَ لَهُۥ بِهِۦ فَإِنَّمَا حِسَابُهُۥ عِندَ رَبِّهِۦٓ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ لَا يُفْلِحُ ٱلْكَـٰفِرُونَ
verses.english: And whoever invokes besides Allah another deity for which he has no proof - then his account is only with his Lord. Indeed, the disbelievers will not succeed.
verses.hausa: Kuma wanda ya kira, tãre da Allah, waɗansu abũbuwan bautãwa na dabam, bã yanã da wani dalĩli game da shĩ (kiran) ba, to hisãbinsa yanã wurin Ubangijinsa kawai. Lalle ne, kãfirai bã su cin nasara.

verses.arabic: وَقُل رَّبِّ ٱغْفِرْ وَٱرْحَمْ وَأَنتَ خَيْرُ ٱلرَّٰحِمِينَ
verses.english: And, [O Muhammad], say, "My Lord, forgive and have mercy, and You are the best of the merciful."
verses.hausa: Kuma ka ce: "Yã Ubangijina! Ka yi gãfara, Ka yi rahama, kuma Kai ne Mafi alhẽrin mãsu rahama."
